title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; chat, generate, embed, list, delete models via simple API wrapper.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); manage models, chats, multi-user, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull models with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic interface to generate and chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI that wraps Ollama HTTP API with fuzzy finder, chat history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat sidebar.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: fine-tune, Docker Compose stacks, LangChain agents, RAG notebooks.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds and dev shells on Linux/macOS.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama generators and chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats with local Ollama models, supports slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels/DMs with streaming replies.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers and run model tests.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to query local docs.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that lets you summarize, translate, or brainstorm with Ollama models inside your notes.

title: ollama-minecraft
summary: Spigot/Paper plugin adding NPCs powered by local Ollama models for in-game conversational agents.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama for easy drop-in replacement.
